name: Digital Firewood
description:
Fire simulation with a customizable indoor and outdoor fireplace. Wet wood turns to dry wood, emitting smoke. Dry wood turns to coal, emitting wood-gas, seen as flames. Coal turns to glow, emitting sparks. Glow turns to ash. Watch logs burn away. Keep the fire going by adding wood, or kick back and set to the unreliable auto mode. Don't add too many logs at once or they float in the air.

You enjoy cozy digital fires? Then also check out: Pixel Fireplace
